title: Doubly stochastic gradient descent
seoDescription: Minimize a Hamiltonian via an adaptive shot optimization strategy with doubly stochastic gradient descent.

references.title: Stochastic gradient descent for hybrid quantum-classical optimization
references.authors: Ryan Sweke, Frederik Wilde, Johannes Jakob Meyer, Maria Schuld, Paul K. Fährmann, Barthélémy Meynard-Piganeau, Jens Eisert
